CustomField.description: The domain name that is to be allowed on the safe list. If only a domain name is entered (e.g. transportnsw.info) then any hostname that matches the domain will be allowed on the safe list (e.g. www.transportnsw.info, www2.transportnsw.info, transportnsw.info). If a FQDN is entered here, then only that specific hostname will be allowed. This is not the intended use, as sometimes people abbreviate the www. off the URL (e.g. transportnsw.info/abcd). It is expected that admins will enter only the domain name and allow all URLs that end with that domain name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the "domain" of the website to be allowed, e.g. "transportnsw.info". Leave off the "www." part of the domain, unless you know what you're doing (using the FQDM will restrict to only the FQDN being marked as safe versus the whole domain).
CustomField.label: Domain Name
